page.title: 17Industry in New Invention
page.content: In New Invention industry is split into 2 industrial estates.The largest is on Fryers Road it consists of a large number of factories employing 20 to 70 people but over a third of these factories are now closed down.A section of the estate is set aside for 13 small factory units each employing about 10 people.Most of the factories in the area are light engineering firms making all sorts of metal and plastic objects.There are 2 exceptions to this one is a chemical waste disposal plant specialising in toxic chemical waste and the other is a heavy engineering firm making large metal sections for the construction industry.The Walsall Refuse Department also has a waste depot in the area.The second estate is smaller but again is mainly light engineering.Both estates are close to junction 9 of the M6.
